document.full_text: the detroit red wings are down 2-0 to the san jose sharks, and that's not by accident. the sharks have outplayed the wings, showing better speed and discipline.
document.title: sharks topping red wings with muscle, speed
lines_and_colors: the detroit red wings are down 2-0 to the san jose sharks, and that's not by accident. the sharks have outplayed the wings, showing better speed and discipline.
